Text.val: 18.05.2011 JH SCR16679 Added call of GB991 if CMON does not exsists
21.04.2011 JH SCR16392 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY and GB002 by GB902
@BAD489 Step10 "Save total limits and outstandings" is implemented in a separate
program to perform the CMON updates outside the BAD480 transaction

SQL_STMT_U.val: update :1/CMON set CMON_VORTEXLIMITS = 0, CMON_VORTEXOUTSTANDINGS = 0 where CMON_YEAR = :2 and CMON_MONTH = :3

select VT02_ADMNO, VT02_CLNTNO, cast(sum(VT02_AMOUNTGNRL) as decimal(13,2)), min(CLNT108_ACC_CURR) from :1/VT02 join :1/CLNT on CLNT101_ADMNO = VT02_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = VT02_CLNTNO where VT02_DATE = ':2' and VT02_LEVEL = 'C' and VT02_AMOUNTGNRL <> 0 group by VT02_ADMNO, VT02_CLNTNO order by VT02_ADMNO, VT02_CLNTNO for fetch only

select VT03_ADMNO, VT03_CLNTNO, cast(sum(VT03_AMOUNTGNRL) as decimal(13,2)), min(CLNT108_ACC_CURR) from :1/VT03 join :1/CLNT on CLNT101_ADMNO = VT03_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = VT03_CLNTNO where VT03_DATE = ':2' and VT03_AMOUNTGNRL <> 0 group by VT03_ADMNO, VT03_CLNTNO order by VT03_ADMNO, VT03_CLNTNO for fetch only
